page.title: 15YOUNGSTERS CLUBS IN BARCOMBE
page.content: {A report by Class 1. These are the clubs for young people in Barcombe: Cubs, Scouts, Venture Scouts, Brownies and Guides.Also: {Quest:}This is a club that studies Bible stories. It is run by a local person who allows the children to use her house, gardens and swimming pool. Throughout the year club members act out Bible stories and famous fables. {Pathfinders:}First members begin by worshipping and then they do their Pilot books. In these are puzzles and quizes about God and the Bible and they can write their own thoughts. {St.Johns:}This teaches young people how to administer first aid.They have their own set uniform. {Barcombe Band:}This is a musical band made up of children of various ages. They each wear a uniform and play different musical instruments.
